title: Account security
2fa-description: Enabling two-factor authentication enhances security by adding an extra layer of protection, reducing the risk of unauthorized access to your accounts.

step-zero.title: Authenticate yourself to activate two-factor authentication
step-zero.description: To activate two-factor authentication, please log in with your password.

step-one.title: Generating the one-time code
step-one.description: At this stage, a one-time code is generated, the value of which is contained in the QR code. This code is used in combination with your usual login details to access your account, adding an extra layer of security.

step-two.title: Use this QR code to configure your authentication application
step-two.description: In this step, enter the single-use code generated in the authentication application you have chosen. This code is temporary and will be valid for one use only.

step-three.title: Use the code generated on the authentication application
step-three.description: In this step, enter the code generated by the authentication application to activate two-factor authentication.

step-four.title: Two-factor authentication successfully activated
step-four.description: Congratulations, you have successfully activated two-factor authentication. You can now use your 2FA code generated on your chosen application to access your account.
step-four.backup-codes-description: Before you leave, please store your backup codes in a safe place. You'll need them if you lose access to your authentication application.
